analysis.Summary: Vue Single-File Component that renders an SVG-based skeleton loader for a short event item row with shimmer animation.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a lightweight placeholder graphic while real event data is being fetched, maintaining layout consistency in event lists.

Components.name: SkeletonEventShort
Components.responsibility: Renders an SVG skeleton for an event row (time rectangle, title rectangle, avatar circles, animated shimmer overlay).

Dependencies: CSS custom properties: --white, --black (for fill colors and opacities)
analysis.Usage: Imported into parent view or list component that displays events. Rendered conditionally during data-loading phases, e.g.: import SkeletonEventShort from 'modules/icons/skeletons/SkeletonEventShort.vue'; ...
Notes: No <script> or <style> blocks â€“ all styling and animation lives inline in the SVG.
Uses `<animate>` inside `<rect>` for infinite horizontal shimmer effect.
Relies on CSS variables for color theming; ensure those are defined at a global level.
Accessibility attributes (aria roles/labels) are not included and could be added if needed.
